review_data.title: Excellent Italian hospitality
review_data.content: We ended up at Al 21 by chance and where positively surpised! Super friendly service, excellent food, good and well assorted wine list. That said, be aware dishes are rather large, so don't overdo it with starters. I'm looking forward to my next visit!
